mapper.select: select coi.id, coi.code, coi.title, coi.content, coi.name, coi.type_id, coi.brand, coi.model, coi.quality, coi.user_id, coi.click_num, coi.click_time, coi.price, coi.store_num, coi.create_time, coi.update_time, coi.status, coi.images, ui.code, ui.name as userName, ui.phone, ui.user_id as oldUserId, ct.name as typeName from commodity_info coi left join owner_info ui on (ui.id = coi.user_id) left join commodity_type ct on (ct.id = coi.type_id) where 1 = 1 AND coi.id = #{commodityId} order by coi.create_time desc
